revision.text:
<languages/> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Mt. Moon |image = [[File:Mt._Moon.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Mt. Moon. |tokens = 75 |location = East of Pewter City, between Route 3 and 4. }} '''Mt. Moon''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 25 tiles arranged in a 5x5 square, including 5 chest tiles, 13 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 834 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | rowspan=2 |[[File:Clefairy.png|40px]] Clefairy|| [[File:Bug_Catcher.png|40px]] Bug Catcher Kent || [[File:Weedle.png|40px]] Weedle, [[File:Kakuna.png|40px]] Kakuna |- | [[File:Lass.png|40px]] Lass Iris || [[File:Clefairy.png|40px]] Clefairy |- | rowspan=3|[[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat || [[File:Super_Nerd.png|40px]] Super Nerd Jovan || [[File:Magnemite.png|40px]] Magnemite,[[File:Voltorb.png|40px]] Voltorb |- | [[File:Bug_Catcher.png|40px]] Bug Catcher Robby || [[File:Caterpie.png|40px]] Caterpie, [[File:Metapod.png|40px]] Metapod, [[File:Caterpie.png|40px]] Caterpie |- | [[File:Lass.png|40px]] Lass Miriam || [[File:Oddish.png|40px]] Oddish, [[File:Bellsprout.png|40px]] Bellsprout |- | rowspan=3|[[File:Paras.png|40px]] Paras || [[File:Youngster.png|40px]] Youngster Josh || [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata,[[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata, [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat |- | [[File:Hiker.png|40px]] Hiker Marcos || [[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude, [[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude, [[File:Onix.png|40px]] Onix |- | [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Sandshrew.png|40px]] Sandshrew, [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata, [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat |- | rowspan=3|[[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude || [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat, [[File:Ekans.png|40px]] Ekans |- | [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata, [[File:Sandshrew.png|40px]] Sandshrew |- | [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata, [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat |- |}

==Items==
===No Debuff===
Mt. Moon
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xClick}} || N/A || 49.99% || 49.85% || 49.13% |- | {{Bag2|Dowsing Machine}} || N/A || 49.99% || 49.85% || 49.13% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Greatball}} || 2 || 0.01% || 0.15% || 0.87% |- | {{Bag2|Small Restore}} || N/A || <0.01% || 0.08% || 0.43% |- | {{Bag2|Star Piece}} || N/A || <0.01% || 0.08% || 0.43% |}
===Debuff Drop Table===
After Reaching Sinnoh, the drop chance for items in Kanto will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
{| class="wikitable collapsible collapsed" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xClick}} || N/A || 50.00% || 50.00% || 50.00% |- | {{Bag2|Dowsing Machine}} || N/A || 50.00% || 50.00% || 50.00% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Greatball}} || 2 || <0.01% || <0.01% || <0.01% |- | {{Bag2|Small Restore}} || N/A || <0.01% || <0.01% || <0.01% |- | {{Bag2|Star Piece}} || N/A || <0.01% || <0.01% || <0.01% |}
